com.baidu.mobads
接口 InterstitialAdListener

public interface InterstitialAdListener

插屏回调接口

方法摘要
 void onAdClick(InterstitialAd interstitialAd)
          广告被点击
 void onAdDismissed()
          广告被关闭(返回键或关闭按钮)
 void onAdFailed(String reason)
          广告请求失败
 void onAdPresent()
          广告显示
 void onAdReady()
          广告加载成功
